physical_appearance:\The image shows a drawing. It is rectangular in shape. The background of the drawing depicts a roofed building. There are two trucks in front of the building. One of the trucks carry workers on its rear end. The other truck has a crane attached to its rear end. The foreground of the drawing contains numerous boats. The signature and year
 \\Tan. 1979\\ is stated at the extreme left hand side. There is a vertical line of Chinese characters
